title: Why Quitting League Of Legends WILL HELP U CHANGE YOUR LIFE FOR THE BETTER SO MUCH
body:

YOU WILL SEE SUCH AMAZING RESULTS.


JUST STOP PLAYING LEAGUE. BE STRONG, BE HARDWORKING.
FUCK SADNESS,  SLOWS U DOWN, MEDITATE (5 MIN EVERYDAY)
FUCK DEPRESSION, FUCKS U UP (RUN BOY RUN, CLEAR YOUR MIND)

GOD BLESS YOU ALL
